name: Glitch Simulator OST (Soundtrack)
detailed_description:
This is the FREE soundtrack for Glitch Simulator in a .wav file, good luck playing it and enjoy! But wait, can you remember any music in the game? Exactly!

Track list:
- Glitch_Simulator_Soundtrack.wav - 20.0 MB

* This DLC is FREE.
** You can find this file in the main installation folder of the game.
